name: Book Recommendation System
desc: A hybrid book recommendation system that combines collaborative filtering, matrix factorization, and deep learning techniques to provide personalized book suggestions. It analyzes user preferences and past behavior to recommend relevant books.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A responsive and interactive personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and education. Features smooth scrolling, modals for projects, and dynamic skill bars.

name: Automated Exam Evaluation System
desc: A web app to automatically evaluate exam papers. Converts uploaded papers to text, compares with AI-generated answers, allocates marks, and provides feedback on errors.

name: Recipe Meal Planner
desc: A web app that helps users plan meals, discover recipes, and generate shopping lists. Users can filter by diet, ingredients, and cooking time. Includes bookmarking and reminders.
